text: Charr', or Char is clan originally found among the Gurjars of India and Pakistan. ==Geographical distribution== They are inhabitants of Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Azad Kashmir, Gilgit-Baltistan, Balochistan and Islamabad areas of Pakistan. And also located in Rajasthan, Gujarat, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Dehli and Jammu and Kashmir regions of north India. ==References== Category:Gurjar clans
title: Charr
